sentences.en: By 1920, Fox and Universal were already names to conjure with.
sentences.cn: 到1920年，福克斯和环球已经声名显赫。

sentences.en: Her grandfather taught her to conjure.
I can't simply conjure up the money out of thin air.
sentences.cn: 我是不能像变魔术似的把钱变来.

sentences.en: I conjure you by all that is holy to desist.
I conjure you not to betray me.
Jean can conjure up a good meal in half an hour.
sentences.cn: 琼能在半小时内变戏法似的做出一顿美味的饭菜.

sentences.en: on the merger scene his is a name to conjure with.
sentences.cn: 他在合并现场扮演了重要的角色。

sentences.en: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.
sentences.cn: 魔术师从帽子里变出一只兔子来。

sentences.en: The mere mention of the words "heart failure", can conjure up, to the layman, the prospect of imminent death.
sentences.cn: 一提“心脏衰竭”四字，外行人就联想到命不久矣的情景。

sentences.en: The real picture is more horrific and stronger but one must conjure up all the associative thoughts and emotions it evokes.
sentences.cn: 真实的画面更恐怖也更震撼，但是它带来的种种感受和情绪需要你自己去联想。

sentences.en: The woman practising witchcraft claimed that she could conjure up the spirits of the dead.
sentences.cn: 那个女巫说她能用魔法召唤亡灵.

sentences.en: The words "Cote d'Azur" conjure up images of sunny days in Mediterranean cafes.
sentences.cn: Coted’Azur（蓝色海岸）这个词让人联想到地中海咖啡馆阳光明媚的日子。

sentences.en: They managed to conjure a victory.
sentences.cn: 他们出人意料地取得了胜利。

sentences.en: Thirteen years ago she found herself having to conjure a career from thin air.
sentences.cn: 13年前，她认识到自己得白手起家创造出一番事业来。

sentences.en: What does the word "feminist" conjure up for you?
sentences.cn: “女权主义者”这个词会让你想到什么？

sentences.en: When he closed his eyes, he could conjure up in exact colour almost every event of his life.
sentences.cn: 他闭上眼睛时，几乎他一生中经历的每一件事情都会真切地浮现在他的脑海。

sentences.en: When we think of adventurers, many of us conjure up images of larger-than-life characters trekking to the North Pole.
sentences.cn: 一想到探险者，我们很多人脑海中浮现的便是长途跋涉前往北极的非凡人物形象。

words.tran_cn: 以念咒召唤神灵；施魔法，变魔术

phrases.tran_cn: 被认为在某活动领域中很重要且有影响的人
想起，使在脑海中显现；用魔法召唤

trans.tran_cn: (以咒文)召唤, 变戏法, 想象
trans.tran_en: to perform clever tricks in which you seem to make things appear, disappear, or change by magic

trans.tran_cn: 变戏法，施魔法，以咒文召唤
